TopicTitle: Could anyone tell me Bill Jeb & Bob's Stats?

Articles.Content: I\'ve gone through about 6 or so crews now and I still have not seen Bill Jeb and Bob. Could someone look into their persistent file and tell me what their stats are so I can add them in myself? (Brave and Dumb stats)
Dude, there are hundreds of different names. Be patient; they\'ll come around. If you simply can\'t, refresh your persistent.sfs.
